title: Three Worlds of Instructional Design: Customized Strategies for Adult Learners in Scientific Fields

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge in scientific disciplines and proficiency in digital device usage
context.additional_context: Instructional design strategy acquisition integrating knowledge-learning-work worlds through project-based science learning solving real-life problems

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and explain complex scientific knowledge systems into three types (conceptual, procedural, and factual)
Learners can diagnose cognitive barriers in scientific problem-solving processes and design personalized learning strategies
Learners can propose practical solutions by conducting science projects that address community issues (e.g., environmental pollution, energy conservation)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
